casebody.data:
STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. ROBERT GRANT MORALES (Nos. 38492, 38493, 38494), Appellant. 506 P2d 733 John K. Hoover, Deputy Public Defender, Salem, argued the cause for appellant. With him on the brief was Gary D. Babcock, Public Defender, Salem. Brian R. Barnes, Deputy District Attorney, Rose-burg, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief was Doyle L. Schiffman, District Attorney, Roseburg.

Argued March 1,

affirmed March 1,

petition for rehearing denied March 29, petition for review allowed June 12, 1973 See later issue of Oregon Reports

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Langtry and Foley, Judges.
